1: %% @doc Property-based tests for normalize_boolean
    2: -module(router_normalize_boolean_prop_SUITE).
    3: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
    4: 
    5: %% Check if PropEr is available
    6: -ifdef(TEST).
    7: -define(HAVE_PROPER, code:which(proper) =/= non_existing).
    8: -else.
    9: -define(HAVE_PROPER, false).
   10: -endif.
   11: 
   12: -ifdef(HAVE_PROPER).
   13: -include_lib("proper/include/proper.hrl").
   14: -endif.
   15: 
   16: -export([all/0, init_per_suite/1, end_per_suite/1]).
   17: -export([
   18:     %% Property tests (available when PropEr is present)
   19:     prop_normalize_boolean_boolean/0,
   20:     prop_normalize_boolean_binary/0,
   21:     prop_normalize_boolean_integer/0,
   22:     prop_normalize_boolean_unknown/0,
   23:     %% Skip fallbacks (used when PropEr is not present)
   24:     prop_normalize_boolean_boolean_skip/1,
   25:     prop_normalize_boolean_binary_skip/1,
   26:     prop_normalize_boolean_integer_skip/1,
   27:     prop_normalize_boolean_unknown_skip/1
   28: ]).
   29: 
   30: all() ->
   31:     case ?HAVE_PROPER of
   32:         false -> [
   33:             prop_normalize_boolean_boolean_skip,
   34:             prop_normalize_boolean_binary_skip,
   35:             prop_normalize_boolean_integer_skip,
   36:             prop_normalize_boolean_unknown_skip
   37:         ];
   38:         true -> [
   39:             prop_normalize_boolean_boolean,
   40:             prop_normalize_boolean_binary,
   41:             prop_normalize_boolean_integer,
   42:             prop_normalize_boolean_unknown
   43:         ]
   44:     end.
   45: 
   46: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   47:     _ = application:load(beamline_router),
   48:     ok = application:set_env(beamline_router, grpc_port, 0),
   49:     ok = application:set_env(beamline_router, grpc_enabled, false),
   50:     ok = application:set_env(beamline_router, nats_mode, mock),
   51:     case application:ensure_all_started(beamline_router) of
   52:         {ok, _} ->
   53:             timer:sleep(200),
   54:             Config;
   55:         Error ->
   56:             ct:fail("Failed to start beamline_router: ~p", [Error])
   57:     end.
   58: 
   59: end_per_suite(Config) ->
   60:     application:stop(beamline_router),
   61:     Config.
   62: 
   63: %% Skip tests if PropEr not available
   64: prop_normalize_boolean_boolean_skip(_Config) ->
   65:     {skip, "PropEr not available"}.
   66: prop_normalize_boolean_binary_skip(_Config) ->
   67:     {skip, "PropEr not available"}.
   68: prop_normalize_boolean_integer_skip(_Config) ->
   69:     {skip, "PropEr not available"}.
   70: prop_normalize_boolean_unknown_skip(_Config) ->
   71:     {skip, "PropEr not available"}.
   72: 
   73: -ifdef(HAVE_PROPER).
   74: 
   75: %% Property: Boolean values normalize correctly
   76: prop_normalize_boolean_boolean() ->
   77:     ?FORALL(Value, boolean(),
   78:         begin
   79:             Result = router_nats_subscriber:normalize_boolean(Value),
   80:             Result =:= Value
   81:         end).
   82: 
   83: %% Property: Binary "true"/"false" normalize correctly
   84: prop_normalize_boolean_binary() ->
   85:     ?FORALL(Value, oneof([<<"true">>, <<"false">>, <<"TRUE">>, <<"FALSE">>, <<"True">>, <<"False">>]),
   86:         begin
   87:             Result = router_nats_subscriber:normalize_boolean(Value),
   88:             case Value of
   89:                 <<"true">> -> Result =:= true;
   90:                 <<"false">> -> Result =:= false;
   91:                 _ -> Result =:= false  %% Case-sensitive, only lowercase works
   92:             end
   93:         end).
   94: 
   95: %% Property: Integer 0/1 normalize correctly
   96: prop_normalize_boolean_integer() ->
   97:     ?FORALL(Value, oneof([0, 1]),
   98:         begin
   99:             Result = router_nats_subscriber:normalize_boolean(Value),
  100:             case Value of
  101:                 0 -> Result =:= false;
  102:                 1 -> Result =:= true
  103:             end
  104:         end).
  105: 
  106: %% Property: Unknown values default to false
  107: prop_normalize_boolean_unknown() ->
  108:     %% Generate values that are NOT known boolean values
  109:     ?FORALL(Value, ?SUCHTHAT(V, oneof([
  110:         ?SUCHTHAT(A, atom(), A =/= true andalso A =/= false),
  111:         ?SUCHTHAT(I, integer(), I =/= 1 andalso I =/= 0),
  112:         ?SUCHTHAT(B, binary(), B =/= <<"true">> andalso B =/= <<"false">>),
  113:         list(),
  114:         float()
  115:     ]), true),
  116:         begin
  117:             Result = router_nats_subscriber:normalize_boolean(Value),
  118:             %% All unknown values should return false
  119:             Result =:= false
  120:         end).
  121:  -endif.
